Summary: Very bright, distant, color changing object. stationary
divs: Sighting DetailsI see it right now...Don't know who to contact. The object is stationary, very bright and "flickering". It's changing colors fromblue to green to red to white. It's very distant and I'm viewing it through a newtonian telescope. It's been there roughly 15 minutes without motion. It's distance won't let me get a clear outline as to it's shape. The closest I could discern is some kind of irregular triangular shape. It's not a star!
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around January 2nd 2011
